import React from 'react'; import './StorageBlock.css'; import './App.css' function StorageBlock(props: any){ function handlestorage(event:any){ let form=props.form; let list=[...props.form.storage]; let element=form.storage[props.index] console.log(element) element.type=event.target.value; list[props.index]=element props.setCurrentForm({...form,storage:list}) console.log(props.form) } function encryption(event:any) return(
